entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
